thread.title: BRIEF-Thomson Reuters Provides Information Related To Future Financial Reporting, Outlook - Reuters

title: BRIEF-Thomson Reuters Provides Information Related To Future Financial Reporting, Outlook - Reuters
text:
May 2 (Reuters) - Thomson Reuters Corp:
* THOMSON REUTERS PROVIDES INFORMATION RELATED TO ITS FUTURE FINANCIAL REPORTING AND OUTLOOK
* THOMSON REUTERS - PROVIDED INFORMATION RELATED TO FUTURE FINANCIAL REPORTING IN CONNECTION WITH PROPOSED DEAL TO SELL MAJORITY INTEREST IN F&R BUSINESS
* THOMSON REUTERS - F&R TO BE REPORTED AS DISCONTINUED OPERATION IN ONGOING 2018 RESULTS BEGINNING WITH Q1 RESULTS AND CONTINUING THROUGH CLOSING DATE OF DEAL
* THOMSON REUTERS - EXPECTS TO INCUR COSTS AND WILL MAKE INVESTMENTS IN 2018 AND 2019 IN ONGOING THOMSON REUTERS BUSINESS RESULTING FROM OPERATIONAL SEPARATION OF F&R FROM REST OF CO Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
